attributes.additional_details:
NO TAXPAYER'S MONEY TO BE SPENT ON THIS VANITY PROJECT.

 It has been  suggested that due to 'austerity', several  leading and significant museums might have to close.
  It is therefore morally and financially  irresponsible (and not a little hypocritical )  to propose a taxpayer-funded mausoleum  in honour of Margaret Thatcher.
Should anybody  want this edifice, destined to be dressed up as 'Margaret Thatcher Memorial Library and Museum', they should raise monies  privately and not assume it will be taxpayer-funded to the tune of £15 million (and the rest...).
 This, like Margaret Thatcher's funeral, is a thinly-veiled piece of tory propaganda, and is of little interest to  further the causes of education and society.
Furthermore  this is the type of 'museum' you will find in PyongYang. ...do you wish Britain to follow in North Korea's footsteps?
If not, please add your signature to this petition.

~~~~~~Please sign, for sanity's sake.~~~~~

rejection.details: It is to be privately funded.
